disassociation_protocol.description: How body part was treated to disassociate it into cells that can float individually in solution in sorter or microfluidics device.

enrichment.description: How cells were enriched for specific type or to weed out common types after disassociation.

total_estimated_cells.description: Total estimated number of cells in sample.  May be 1 for well based assays.

well.description: If sample was isolated in a well in plate (or fluidics chip), information about that
